#summary Working with DwC Extensions

= Introduction =
 * Extension definition as XML file. Example: http://gbrds.gbif.org/resources/extensions/vernacularName.xml
 * Registered with registry. Currently please email GBIF (Jose, Markus, Tim). List of currently registered files:
    * http://gbrds.gbif.org/registry/ipt/extensions.json
    * http://gbrds.gbif.org/registrydev/ipt/extensions.json
 * To update your IPT go to admin/extensions and click on "synchronize"
